reporter_caption.center: GODLAN, INC. v. DCL, INC., 469 Mich. 876 (2003)

caption.center: GODLAN, INC. v. DCL, INC. (GODLAN, INC. v. WHITEFORD).

opinion.opinion_text:
Leave to Appeal Denied.
No. 123558. The application for leave to appeal as cross-appellant does not pertain to the Court of Appeals case at issue in the application for leave to appeal, Docket No. 231555. It instead seeks leave to appeal the March 11, 2003, judgment of the Court of Appeals in Docket No. 227696. Accordingly, it is treated as a delayed application for leave to appeal from Court of Appeals Docket No. 227696, and is dismissed as untimely. MCR 7.302(C)(3). Court of Appeals No. 231555.
